iOS Development from A-Z

03 Mar 2018

Reading time ~1 minute

Have you ever wondered how to write code in Swift? Curious how what tools and skills you need to make iOS Apps? Follow this project on my journey to making cool apps and learning different tools. As well, if your interested in taking this course yourself, check out the link Here. Feel free to download the project and try it out! Below are some screen captures taken from this project.

The following Application(s) where built on X-Code 9.1 and Tested on iOS 10-11.0.3 This application will and can run on the following devices.

* iPhone 6   * iPhone 6s   * iPhone 6s + (Some Size Reformat Needed)
* iPhone 7   * iPhone 7 + (Some Size Reformat Needed)
* iPhone 8   * iPhone 8 + (Some Size Reformat Needed)
* iPhone X (Most Of The Time)   * iPhone XS (Most Of The Time)
* iPhone SE / 5S / 5C (Most Of The Time)
